What it is: Reveals how social image manipulates your goals.
How to use it: Describe your current ambitions. Ask AI which ones are driven more by optics than genuine need.
What it changes: Reduces performative motivation and strengthens internal alignment.

What it is: Maps the unpaid, unnoticed efforts you provide to others or systems.
How to use it: Describe a typical week. Ask AI to identify energy outflows you haven’t acknowledged.
What it changes: Reveals exploitation and improves emotional budgeting.

What it is: Systematic guide for emotional repair and release.
How to use it: Describe something you can’t forgive yourself for. Ask AI to walk you through steps of compassion and repair.
What it changes: Alleviates guilt loops and frees cognitive space.

What it is: Lets you see through the lens of another culture or belief system.
How to use it: Describe a belief. Ask AI to explain how that belief would be seen in a different cultural or historic context.
What it changes: Builds pluralism and loosens cultural ego.

How to use it: Describe a life direction you're debating. Ask AI which version you’re most likely to regret, and why.
What it changes: Helps prioritize values over convenience or fear.

What it is: Detects repeating dysfunction in your life narrative.
How to use it: Describe five different regrets or frustrations. Ask AI what invisible pattern they reflect.
What it changes: Reveals unconscious loops and improves pattern literacy.

What it is: A ritualized way to release lingering obligation or shame.
How to use it: Describe a past failure. Ask AI to rewrite it as a myth of redemption or evolution.

What it is: Flips your priority list to test deeper attachments.
How to use it: List five goals. Ask AI what your life would look like if the last one were the most important.
What it changes: Disrupts unconscious hierarchies and invites surprising clarity.

What it is: Models the emotional center of gravity in your life story.
How to use it: Describe your life in five sentences. Ask AI which event everything else orbits emotionally.
What it changes: Uncovers root memory and resets narrative orientation.

What it is: Reveals what hidden benefit you get from your worst habits.
How to use it: Describe a bad habit. Ask AI what secret emotional reward or protection it provides.
What it changes: Turns coping into insight and enables conscious replacement.
